alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 5:23PM CDT until September 09 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 523 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Brady to near Maxwell to Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brady, Maxwell, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, Keith, Jeffrey Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, and Cottonwood Canyon State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 184 and 206. Highway 83 between mile markers 69 and 78. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
